  • Achievements
  • Register for iGEM, have a great summer, and attend the Giant Jamboree.
  • Meet all deliverables on the Competition Deliverables page.
  • Create a page on your team wiki with clear attribution of each aspect of your project. Show me!
  • Participate in the Interlab Measurement Study Show me!

bronze

  • Convince the judges that at least one new BioBrick Part of your own design that is central to your project works as expected. Show me!
  • Convince the judges you have significantly worked with any other registered iGEM team in a meaningful way. Show me!
  • Convince the judges you have thought carefully and creatively about whether your work is safe, responsible and good for the world. Show me!

silver

  • Expand on your silver medal activity by demonstrating how you have integrated the investigated issues into the design and/or execution of your project. Show me!
  • Convince the judges that your project's design and/or implementation is based on insight you have gained from modeling. Show me!

gold

  • Running for best Manufacturing Project Show me!
  • Running for best Education and Public Engagement Show me!
  • Running for best Model Show me!
  • Running for best Integrated Human Practices Show me!

prizes
